extensionDescription.message: The essential tool for effectively gathering YouTube insights.

geminiAPIDescription.message: Set Gemini API to get suggested questions in the ask dialog. Get API Key for free!

defaultFavoriteQuestion1.message: What is the main idea of this content? Just the conclusion briefly.

defaultFavoriteQuestion2.message: Please summarize briefly, focusing on the key points.

extensionContextInvalidatedError.message: The Chrome extension has been updated. Please refresh the page and try again.

invalidResponseError.message: Response processing failed. Please try again later.

invalidRequestError.message: Invalid request, please try again later.

transcriptNotFoundError.message: Video transcript not found. Required to ask the AI.

failedToLoadDefaultQuestionError.message: Failed to load default question, please try again later.

failedToLoadQuestionsError.message: Failed to load questions, please try again later.

geminiApiKeyNotSetError.message: Gemini API key not set. Please set a valid Gemini API key on Settings of Ask on YouTube!

geminiApiKeyNotValidError.message: Invalid Gemini API key. Please set a valid Gemini API key on Settings of Ask on YouTube!

unknownError.message: An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page and try again.

chatgptLoginRequired.message: Ask on YouTube: ChatGPT login is required to request long text. Please log in and try again.

chatgptMorePages.message: Do not respond yet. There are more pages to come.
